systemEntities.title: Select EMM Entity
systemEntities.description: Choose an EMM entity to map with your metadata

mapping.title: Create Mapping
mapping.entityModeDescription: Map the entire entity structure at once. This will automatically map all fields based on their order.
mapping.fieldModeDescription: Map individual fields one by one for more precise control.

steps.metadataDesc: Paste your metadata JSON to begin
steps.selectEntityDesc: Choose which entity from your metadata you want to map
steps.chooseFieldsDesc: Review the fields of your selected entity
steps.mappingDesc: Create mapping rules between your fields and the API fields

messages.mappingInstructions: Create mapping rules by selecting source and target fields
